[req]
default_bits = 4096
prompt = no
default_md = sha256
x509_extensions = req_ext
req_extensions = req_ext
distinguished_name = dn

[ dn ]
C=US
ST=New York
L=New York
O=MyOrg
OU=MyOrgUnit
emailAddress=me@working.me
CN = tls.test.apps.savita47new.tekton.codereadyqe.com

[ req_ext ]
subjectAltName = @alt_names

[ alt_names ]
DNS.1 = tls.test
DNS.2 = tls.test.apps.savita47new.tekton.codereadyqe.com
